document_data.caption: Kyriani casting glitterdust at Luna.
document_data.name: Glitterdust
document_data.mainbody: '''''Glitterdust''''' (originally called '''''Fahren's glitterdust''''') was a [[conjuration]] [[spell]] from the [[:Category:Creation spells|creation subschool]] that created a burst of golden particles that stuck to everything in an area.
document_data.Effects: Upon completing this spell, the caster created a cloud of glittering dust with a twenty-foot diameter within a medium distance. The particles stuck to anyone and anything, including invisible creatures or objects, which allowed their outlines to be recognized. In addition to this revelatory effect, the glitter particles could blind some creatures for a short time.
document_data.Components: To cast this spell required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s and some ground [[mica]].
document_data.Notable Users: * During the [[Time of Troubles]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, [[Kyriani]] cast ''glitterdust'' against the brainwashed [[Luna]] in an effort to subdue her. However, Luna's godly magic was too strong, and she was able to blow the glitter away as a whirlwind. Nevertheless, the distraction was enough for [[Vajra Valmeyjar]] to tackle Luna.{{Cite comic/Total Eclipse|8}}
